entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who has had an impact on many people's lives. He is described as having 'trod on an awful lot of important toes', suggesting that he was not universally liked.

entities.name: dodgy doge
entities.description: Doge is mentioned as a nickname for Dumbledore, implying that he has a reputation for being somewhat dodgy or untrustworthy.

entities.name: skeeter
entities.description: Skeeter is mentioned as the author of a biography about Dumbledore. She claims to have uncovered surprises about his life that will shock readers.

relationships.description: Skeeter has written a biography about Dumbledore, suggesting a close relationship between the two.
Dumbledore is the subject of Skeeter's biography, indicating that she has researched and written about his life.
